```{r}
hurricanes <- tidy_ext_tracks(ext_tracks)
ike <- hurricane(hurricanes, "Ike-2008")
```

```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot(data = ike,
                mapping =
                  ggplot2::aes(lng = longitude, lat = latitude,
                               r_ne = ne,
                               r_se = se,
                               r_sw = sw,
                               r_nw = nw)) +
  geom_hurricane(fill = "black")
```
